1001.Title: Daily Challenge is Here!
1001.Text: The new daily challenge is ready! See how many hidden words you can find today!

1002.Title: New Level Unlocked!
1002.Text: You've unlocked a new game level. Are you ready for a fresh word puzzle adventure?

1003.Title: Today's Progress Reward!
1003.Text: Don't forget to log in and claim your reward. There's a surprise waiting for you every day.

1004.Title: Begin Word Adventure!
1004.Text: A new word puzzle, a new challenge is waiting for you. Let's get started!

1005.Title: Good Afternoon!
1005.Text: Fresh word puzzles are at your fingertips, ready for your solving skills. Let's kick off the fun!

1006.Title: Good Afternoon!
1006.Text: A brand-new word puzzle is waiting for your solution. Let's start unlocking word mysteries!

1007.Title: Good Afternoon!
1007.Text: Let's embark on this journey of words and excitement together!

1008.Title: Good Afternoon!
1008.Text: Don't miss today's daily tasks,  completing them will earn you additional rewards.
